Name: Ninka
AboutMe:
Anh is an enthusiastic programmer who values simplicity of life. My mantra is: simpler, funnier, and better. Therefore, he aims to develop applications which are not only useful but also simple to use. he is passionate on learning from other people and helping people to learn new things. For that reason, he is really open-minded.

Anh likes Java as a programming language, because Java-related frameworks, libraries, and books have been very well documented most of the time. Moreover, he likes the idea of JVM which helps the programs run anywhere (JVM can be installed). In addition, he continuously trying new languages and frameworks during his work and study to get new ideas and structures improve his development time and enlarge his thinking.

In addition, Anh has had a burning desire for computer games and animations since he was a child. All the movements of many creative characters have been always attracting him. He would likes to become a game designer and programmer who will designs the story of the characters, makes them alive, and makes all people happy playing games, especially the children. Therefore, he still keeps making games as his hobby.
